issue.title: [C++] Add -Wshorten-64-to-32 to list of CHECKIN warnings tested by clang
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16387](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16387). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This particular warning is mostly policed by MSVC anyways so it shouldn't be too controversial.  Having it detected by clang will help to accelerate the test/debug cycle so we don't have to rely on appveyor as much.
